src:
Gempa M 5,3 Guncang Sulut, Tak Berpotensi Tsunami
01 Nov 2019, 10:05 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Ilustrasi gempa bumi. (Istockphoto/ Vchal)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Badan Meteorologi, Klimatologi, dan Geofisika (BMKG) mencatat gempa bumi dengan magnitudo 5,3 mengguncang Sulawesi Utara."Gempa dengan magnitudo 5,3 terjadi pada 1 November 2019 pukul 09.33.57 WIB," cuit BMKG di akun Twitter resminya, Jumat (1/11).



Pusat gempanya berada di 3,25 Lintang Utara, 127,07 Bujur Timur, atau 93 Kilometer arah Tenggara Melonguane, Sulawesi Utara."Kedalaman [gempa] 10 Km, tidak berpotensi tsunami," tutup BMKG.(arh/pmg)
text:
5.3 M Earthquake Shakes North Sulawesi, Not Potential for Tsunami
01 Nov 2019, 10:05 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Illustration of an earthquake. (Istockphoto / Vchal)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - The Meteorology, Climatology and Geophysics Agency (BMKG) recorded an earthquake with a magnitude of 5.3 shaking North Sulawesi. "An earthquake with a magnitude of 5.3 occurred on November 1, 2019 at 09.33.57 West Indonesia Time," BMKG shook in North Sulawesi. official Twitter account, Friday (1/11).



The epicenter was at 3.25 North Latitude, 127.07 East Longitude, or 93 Kilometers southeast of Melonguane, North Sulawesi. "Depth [earthquake] 10 Km, no potential for tsunami," closed BMKG. (Arh / pmg)
